column5: Come vacation at our peaceful Lakeside Overlook, with its beautiful views of Canyon Lake, it is one you will remember for a lifetime. Canyon Lake is a unique community of rolling hills looking over the sparkling lake fed by the Guadalupe River. This home is just a few blocks away from Boat Ramp #8 on Canyon Lake. Several other boat ramps are within a few miles of the home. Head down the road and sit at the water's edge at Cranes Mill Park.
